title: Texas Court Allows Abuse Inquiries of Parents of Transgender Children - The New York Times
content:
1. Texas Court Allows Abuse Inquiries of Parents of Transgender Children  The New York Times
  2. Texas allows investigations of trans families to continue. Here's what it means for both sides.  KHOU 11
  3. Texas can continue investigating families seeking gender-affirming care for their transgender children, state Supreme Court says  CNN
  4. These parents didn't embrace gender-affirming care. Texas investigated them  The Dallas Morning News
  5. Texas court allows the state to investigate gender-affirming care as child abuse  NPR
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: But the court said Gov. Greg Abbott did not have the authority to order such investigations, acknowledging they could cause “irreparable harm.”
